name: part_007
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ4周年LIVE】ちょこから感謝を込めて4周年3ＤLIVE‼【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [XKBbbN7M44E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Cheat Casino' (イカサマ⇔カジノ).
MC section after the song performance. Choco and Lui talk about the performance and move to a photo spot.

subtitles.original: イカサマ⇔カジノ
subtitles.english: Cheat Casino

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲 ひとしずく×やま△
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition by Hitoshizuku x Yama△

subtitles.original: 欲望　喧騒　駆け引き　渦巻くアンダーシティ
subtitles.english: Greed, noise, and tactics swirling in the Undercity.

subtitles.original: 仕事　成功　夢希望　求める猛者たち
subtitles.english: Work, success, dreams, and hopes sought by the fierce.

subtitles.original: 満天ディーラーギャンブラー　集まるカジノで
subtitles.english: Dealers and gamblers gathered under a full sky at the casino.

subtitles.original: あなたの大事なモノ　全部賭けましょう
subtitles.english: Let's bet everything you hold dear.

subtitles.original: 今宵のGameは何だい？
subtitles.english: What's the game tonight?

subtitles.original: ほどよい刺激を頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me some moderate excitement.

subtitles.original: ホイール回してボール落とす　簡単なゲーム
subtitles.english: Spin the wheel and drop the ball, such a simple game.

subtitles.original: メランコリーなんて　退屈すぎるわ
subtitles.english: Melancholy is just too boring.

subtitles.original: 狙うは36倍
subtitles.english: Aiming for 36 times the payout.

subtitles.original: さあ　二人のステージへ
subtitles.english: Now, to the stage of the two of us.

subtitles.original: 行くよ？
subtitles.english: Shall we go?

subtitles.original: いいよ？
subtitles.english: I'm ready.

subtitles.original: 目にも留まらぬ神業で　Show Time!!
subtitles.english: With god-like skill faster than the eye can see, Show Time!!

subtitles.original: 運命的なシチュエーションで　遊戯盤は廻り出す
subtitles.english: In a fateful situation, the game board begins to spin.

subtitles.original: 完敗　失うのは　金かプライドか？
subtitles.english: Complete defeat. Is it money or pride you lose?

subtitles.original: 瞳を閉じたその隙に　心ごと奪ってあげましょう
subtitles.english: In the gap when you close your eyes, I'll steal your whole heart.

subtitles.original: 羨望　幻想　溜息　渦巻くアンダーシティ
subtitles.english: Envy, illusion, and sighs swirling in the Undercity.

subtitles.original: 裏切り　翻弄　自己破産　破れた猛者たち
subtitles.english: Betrayal, mockery, and bankruptcy for the broken ones.

subtitles.original: 成り金負け犬堕天使　掃き溜めのカジノで
subtitles.english: Upstarts, losers, and fallen angels in the gutter of the casino.

subtitles.original: あなたの大事なモノ　全部賭けましょう
subtitles.english: Let's bet everything you hold dear.

subtitles.original: 今宵のGameは何だい？
subtitles.english: What's the game tonight?

subtitles.original: ほどよい刺激を頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me some moderate excitement.

subtitles.original: トランプ5枚だけ揃える　簡単なゲーム
subtitles.english: Just matching five cards, such a simple game.

subtitles.original: ブラフで攻めるなんて　退屈すぎるぜ？
subtitles.english: Attacking with a bluff is just too boring, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 狙うはDeep Jackpotのみ
subtitles.english: Aiming only for the Deep Jackpot.

subtitles.original: さあ　二人のステージへ
subtitles.english: Now, to the stage of the two of us.

subtitles.original: 行くよ？
subtitles.english: Shall we go?

subtitles.original: いいよ？
subtitles.english: I'm ready.

subtitles.original: 目にも留まらぬ神業で　Show Time!!
subtitles.english: With god-like skill faster than the eye can see, Show Time!!

subtitles.original: 運命的なシチュエーションで　遊戯盤は廻り出す
subtitles.english: In a fateful situation, the game board begins to spin.

subtitles.original: 完敗　失うのは　夢かプライドか？
subtitles.english: Complete defeat. Is it dreams or pride you lose?

subtitles.original: 瞳を閉じたその裏に　痛いほど刻んであげましょう
subtitles.english: I'll carve it into you so painfully behind those closed eyes.

subtitles.original: 最後のゲームは何だい？
subtitles.english: What is the final game?

subtitles.original: イカサマだらけの勝敗
subtitles.english: A victory or defeat full of cheating.

subtitles.original: サイコロ・ロールを繰り返す　簡単なゲーム
subtitles.english: Repeating dice rolls, such a simple game.

subtitles.original: Odds Betで一杯　退屈すぎるわ
subtitles.english: Full of Odds Bets, it's just too boring.

subtitles.original: そろそろシロクロつけましょう
subtitles.english: It's time to settle this once and for all.

subtitles.original: 二人の勝負へ…
subtitles.english: To our match...

subtitles.original: 行くよ？
subtitles.english: Shall we go?

subtitles.original: いいよ？
subtitles.english: I'm ready.

subtitles.original: 目にも留まらぬ神業で　Show Time!!
subtitles.english: With god-like skill faster than the eye can see, Show Time!!

subtitles.original: 絶対的なシチュエーションで　遊戯盤は廻り出す
subtitles.english: In an absolute situation, the game board begins to spin.

subtitles.original: 完敗　失うのは　神かプライドか？
subtitles.english: Complete defeat. Is it God or pride you lose?

subtitles.original: 瞳を閉じる暇もない　心ごと崩してあげましょう
subtitles.english: No time even to blink, I'll tear down your heart completely.

subtitles.original: 目にも留まらぬ神業で　Show Time!!
subtitles.english: With god-like skill faster than the eye can see, Show Time!!

subtitles.original: 感動的なシチュエーションで　遊戯盤は廻り出す
subtitles.english: In a moving situation, the game board begins to spin.

subtitles.original: 逆転　失ったのは　愛かプライドか？
subtitles.english: A turnaround. Is it love or pride you lost?

subtitles.original: 瞳を閉じたその隙に　心ごと奪ってあげましょう
subtitles.english: In the gap when you close your eyes, I'll steal your whole heart.

subtitles.original: うわあー！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: うわあー！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: ちょこせーん！
subtitles.english: Choco-sen!

subtitles.original: るいさまー！
subtitles.english: Lui-sama!

subtitles.original: いや、今日はお呼びいただきありがとうございます。そしておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for inviting me today. And congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: いやー、もう、ちょこるい様とかっこいいちょこ衣装で歌いたいと思って。
subtitles.english: I really wanted to sing with you, Lui-sama, in this cool Choco outfit.

subtitles.original: いや、めちゃくちゃ嬉しい。今回「イカサマ⇔カジノ」ね、めちゃくちゃかっこいいから。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy. 'Cheat Casino' is just so cool.

subtitles.original: そう、めちゃちょこ好きな曲だからね、一緒に歌えてめっちゃ嬉しい。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's a song I really love, so I'm so glad we could sing it together.

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いつも可愛いな、もうちょこせんは。
subtitles.english: Choco-sen is always so cute.

subtitles.original: いや、もうそんな…
subtitles.english: Oh, stop it...

subtitles.original: ちょっと今日のこの可愛くてかっこいい姿を、一緒にパシャリしてくれる？
subtitles.english: Will you take a photo with me in this cute and cool outfit today?

subtitles.original: もちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとるい様の映えスポット教えてもらっていいですか？
subtitles.english: Um, could you show me your best photo spot, Lui-sama?

subtitles.original: オッケーです。じゃあ行きましょうか。
subtitles.english: Okay. Let's go then.

subtitles.original: じゃあジャンプしていきますよ。せーの！
subtitles.english: I'm going to jump. Ready? One, two...

subtitles.original: ていっ！
subtitles.english: Tei!

subtitles.original: ていっ！
subtitles.english: Tei!

subtitles.original: はい、こちらが映えスポットです。どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here's the photo spot. What do you think?

subtitles.original: え、めっちゃかっこいい！
subtitles.english: Whoa, it's so cool!

subtitles.original: そう、私のねステージを選んでくれたので、ご紹介させていただきましたが。
subtitles.english: Since you chose my stage, I thought I'd introduce it.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ここでやりますか？
subtitles.english: Shall we do it here?

subtitles.original: え、ピースで行く？
subtitles.english: Should we do a peace sign?

subtitles.original: あ、背中合わせがいい、背中合わせでじゃあ。
subtitles.english: Oh, let's go back-to-back. Back-to-back then.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 写真撮ってるかな、みんな。
subtitles.english: Is everyone taking photos?
